html:
** Shares of electric vehicle maker Rivian Automotive RIVN.O down 11.9% at $89.3

** Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O, RIVN's biggest investor, agrees to buy electric delivery vans from rival automaker Stellantis NV STLA.MI, a deal that could help STLA close the gap with Tesla Inc TSLA.O (Full Story)

** Amazon has a previous agreement to buy up to 100,000 electric vans from Rivian; it also has exclusive rights to Rivian's vans for four years, according to RIVN's Oct 1 regulatory filing

** Eleven of 15 brokerages rate the stock "buy" or higher, four "hold"; their median PT is $137.5 - Refinitiv data

** Shares down 9.4% since RIVN went public in Nov 2021


(Reporting by Kannaki Deka in Bengaluru)

(( Kannaki.Deka@thomsonreuters.com ))
